Varying item effects???
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Varying item effects???
By big jay on Friday, July 9, 2010 - 12:19 pm:

Hello, i was looking through the post on effects that items have and i couldn't find an answer so can anyone tell me if items have different effects on different monsters?...

To clarify my question, the foods we give our monsters in the beginning of every month have different effects depending on whether or not the monster likes, hates, or is impartial to that particular food item. So is this true for any food? For instance, my Mr.Wiggles(worm/golem) likes: nuts oil... so does it provide any added benefit in comparison to a monster who is indifferent, or even hates it?

By Elf* on Friday, July 9, 2010 - 01:22 pm:

If it likes nuts oil then it receives the 'HAD' effect, so called as hengers, arrowheads and durahans
all naturally like nuts oil, which means that nuts oil takes away 1/5 stress as well as the usual
fatigue. As far as I'm aware, monsters can't dislike nuts oil.

By big jay on Friday, July 9, 2010 - 02:39 pm:

Oh I see, thanks a ton Elf! Is there any other items with similar effects?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, July 9, 2010 - 04:09 pm:

A monster that likes Nuts Oil gets the neutral values on all foods. No boost on Nuts Oil.

By big jay on Friday, July 9, 2010 - 08:56 pm:

Really, that is pretty interesting. Thanks for the help people :)

By Elf* on Saturday, July 10, 2010 - 12:27 am:

So the HAD effect is a completely separate thing? I always thought it was just to do with liking
nuts oil. And on a similar note can I ask about my Wracky who likes 'Razor Blade' which I'm
assuming is an item that gets asked for and relieves 1 stress or something similar, and what
bonus he gets from this?

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, July 10, 2010 - 02:34 pm:

There's no bonus for any 'like' other than foods.

And the HAD effect is by breed only.
